named-query.name: FileEntity.findByFileName
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM FileEntity f WHERE f.fileName LIKE :fileName ORDER BY f.uploadDate DESC

named-query.name: FileEntity.findByContentType
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM FileEntity f WHERE f.contentType = :contentType ORDER BY f.uploadDate DESC

named-query.name: FileEntity.findByDateRange
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM FileEntity f WHERE f.uploadDate BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate ORDER BY f.uploadDate DESC

named-query.name: FileEntity.findLargeFiles
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM FileEntity f WHERE f.fileSize > :minSize ORDER BY f.fileSize DESC
